headline: Will new nuclear energy deals generate FOMO mentality in Big Tech?
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) has inked a 20-year deal to provide tech giant Meta Platforms (META) with power from its clean nuclear energy plant starting in 2027. Mizuho Americas managing director and senior analyst of utilities Anthony Crowdell discusses the Constellation-Meta deal, as well as other energy agreements as grid demand soars to power AI data centers, and the regulation around nuclear plants after President Trump signed an executive order in May to ease restrictions around nuclear reactor development. Catch Yahoo Finance's interview with Nano Nuclear Energy founder, executive chairman, and president Jay Yu on the nuclear energy landscape. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

Mizuho Americas managing director and senior analyst of utilities Anthony Crowdell discusses the Constellation-Meta deal, as well as other energy agreements as grid demand soars to power AI data centers, and the regulation around nuclear plants after President Trump signed an executive order in May to ease restrictions around nuclear reactor development. Catch Yahoo Finance's interview with Nano Nuclear Energy founder, executive chairman, and president Jay Yu on the nuclear energy landscape. headline: Constellation Energy (NasdaqGS:CEG) Secures 20-Year Clean Energy Deal With Meta

headline: Power-Plant Builder Tops Buy Point, Earning Encore As Stock Of The Day
summary: Heavy construction company Quanta Services broke out past a buy point Tuesday.  Houston-based Quanta is one of the highest-rated stocks in IBD's heavy construction industry group, which has hoisted itself into the top 40 of IBD's 197 group rankings.  The company specializes in construction services for utility companies.

headline: JPMorgan Banker Warns of Silicon Valley Trap for Clean Tech

headline: Constellation and Meta, Merck, Snowflake: Trending Tickers
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) has inked a 20-year deal to provide tech giant Meta Platforms (META) with power from its clean nuclear energy plant. Merck (MRK) has reportedly been in talks to acquire Swiss biotech company MoonLake Immunotherapeutics (MLTX) for over $3 billion, according to the Financial Times. Snowflake (SNOW) will buy startup Crunchy Data in an agreement valued at $250 million. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Tariff push, OECD forecasts, Constellation-Meta deal: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) dip Tuesday morning as US officials are pressing nations for their best trade deals, according to a report from Reuters. Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) cut its forecasts for the US and global economies. Constellation Energy (CEG) shares jump in pre-market trading after reaching a 20-year deal to provide power from its nuclear energy plant to Meta Platforms (META).
